# coxedge_compute_workload_firewall_group (Resource)

Allows you to manage firewall group

Example Usage
---

```
resource "coxedge_compute_workload_firewall_group" "firewall_group" {
  organization_id  = "<organization_id>"
  environment_name = "<environment name>"
  workload_id      = "<workload_id>"
  firewall_id      = "<firewall_id>"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->

## Argument Reference

The following arguments are supported:

### Required

- `environment_name` (String) - The name of the environment.
- `organization_id` (String) - The id of the organization.
- `workload_id` (String) - The id of the workload.
- `firewall_id` (String) - The Firewall Group id.
